template.name: Arista Environment Core SNMP
template.description: MIBs used: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB ENTITY-STATE-MIB ENTITY-MIB

condition.value: (Power supply sensor|ORing FET sensor|Ambient sensor|PFC sensor|Hotspot|Inlet|Exhaust|Primary hotspot|Secondary hotspot)

trigger_prototype.name: Temperature is CRITICAL: {#SENSOR_INFO}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Temperature is HIGH: {#SENSOR_INFO}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

macro.description: Update interval used in items/discovery rules
